servers.name: OpenTK MCP Server
servers.description: A Model Control Protocol (MCP) server for OpenTK, allowing Claude to interact with 3D graphics and simulations.
servers.author: r-huijts

servers.name: GitHub MCP
servers.description: GitHub integration for Claude, enabling repository management, issue tracking, and code review directly from your conversations.
servers.author: Example Author

servers.name: Context7 MCP
servers.description: Real-time documentation lookup for popular libraries and frameworks, powered by Context7.
servers.author: Example Author

servers.name: Vibe Check MCP
servers.description: AI metacognition tools for better decision making and error prevention in your Claude conversations.
servers.author: Example Author
